answers.answer: My son just came on his own at 34 weekhe was 5 lbs 4oz he was in nicu for 2 1/2 it was the hardest 2 1/2 weekd of my life don't force them to stop the baby from coming everything happened for a reason I just let my baby come there was really nothing they could do now he is home with me almost 3 months old he came 6 weeks early good luck and just don't stress out

I gave birth to my son on Thursday due to pre clampsia. He was born at 34 weeks and 2 days he is still in Nicu because he was breathing too quickly. Even though he was 6 weeks early he was 7lbs 7.4oz so his lungs are working extra hard to support him. But he is well and getting stronger everyday. Hopefully he can come home soon.

My daughter was born at 32 weeks, emergency c-section d/t preeclampsia. She was 2 lbs 14oz (had a growth restriction), 25 days in the NICU & now she is a perfectly fine 19 month old! Try not to stress, as hard as that is! Think happy thoughts for baby!!

My first pregnancy my water broke at 32 weeks.  I was in the hospital for 2 weeks when they induced due to greater risk of infection.  He was 5 lb 10 oz and spent 6 days in the NICU.  He is a perfectly happy and healthy 10, almost 11 yr old.  Are they giving you steroid shots for the baby's lungs?  If not, I would request it.  I believe that's why my son only had a 6 day stay.

Thanks ladies its helpful to know success stories.  Yes they are giving me shot for his lungs once a day!  Dr lungs aren't developed yet. He is about 5 lbs. I'm just praying he stays in for a few days so shots can function properly

My waters broke at 32 weeks while i was at work, went to the hospital and gave me injection for babies lungs and the same the next day, they wanted to keep me in hospital for as long as possible but they said if you go into labour we cant stop it. It was dec 22nd when my waters broke and then went into labour on christmas day and had my son 6 hrs later. He stayed in hospital for 26 days. Happy to say he is a very healthy and happy boy, will be turning 3 this christmas :)
They can give you magnesium sulfate to delay labor.  I wad actually part of the study for it, but they later concluded it works to delay.  In my case, I didn't go into labor until they induced me.

I had.my son at 35 wks. He had iugr and was 3.5 lbs. He only was slightly jaundice thank god he didn't need the nicu. So just try to stay calm and relax until your peanut.comes. it will help your labor from delaying if you relax. But if they decide they have to get the baby out bc of infection. Don't freak out it will be for the best and he will be.OK no matter what. Good luck momma.
I had my son at 30-31 weeks due to water breaking at 29-30, got the shots for his lungs and they did an emergency c section round 31 weeks he was 3 lbs, hell be three yrs old this month

question: I'm 32weeks and woke up to my water breaking!  They are keeping me at the hospital till baby is born and trying to hold him in till 36weeks. Please pray for us!  Any moms have premature baby or in my situation?  Tips?? I'm so nervous
title: premature labor
